SEARCH
Package net.delugan.teachly.user

Class UserRestController

java.lang.Object
net.delugan.teachly.user.UserRestController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1") public class UserRestController extends Object
REST controller for user-related operations. Provides endpoints for retrieving user information.

      Retrieves the authenticated user.

    • getUserById

      @GetMapping("users/{id}") public User getUserById(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Retrieves a user by ID, without exposing the email.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      The user with the specified ID, with email field hidden
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no user is found with the given ID
